   22: -module(mnesia_config_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: 
   25: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   26:  
   27: -record(test_table,{i,a1,a2,a3}).
   28: -record(test_table2,{i, b}).
   29: 
   30: -export([
   31: 	all/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   32: 	 access_module/1,
   33: 	 auto_repair/1,
   34: 	 backup_module/1,
   35: 	 debug/1,
   36: 	 dir/1,
   37: 	 dump_log_load_regulation/1,
   38: 	
   39: 	 dump_log_update_in_place/1,
   40: 	 event_module/1,
   41:          backend_plugin_registration/1,
   42: 	 inconsistent_database/1,
   43: 	 max_wait_for_decision/1,
   44: 	 send_compressed/1,
   45: 
   46: 	 app_test/1,
   47: 	
   48: 	 schema_merge/1,
   49: 	 unknown_config/1,
   50: 
   51: 	 dump_log_time_threshold/1,
   52: 	 dump_log_write_threshold/1,
   53: 	 
   54: 	 start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less/1,
   55: 	 start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full/1,
   56: 	 start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less/1,
   57: 	 schema_location_and_extra_db_nodes_combinations/1,
   58: 	 table_load_to_disc_less_nodes/1,
   59: 	
   60: 	 dynamic_basic/1,
   61: 	 dynamic_ext/1,
   62: 	 dynamic_bad/1,
   63: 
   64: 	 init_per_testcase/2,
   65: 	 end_per_testcase/2,
   66: 	 c_nodes/0
   67: 	]).
   68: 
   69: -export([check_logs/1]).
   70: 
   71: -define(init(N, Config),
   72: 	mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
   73: 					   delete_schema,
   74: 					   {reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
   75: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   76: -define(acquire(N, Config),
   77: 	mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
   78: 					   delete_schema,
   79: 					   {reload_appls, [mnesia]},
   80: 					   create_schema,
   81: 					   {start_appls, [mnesia]}],
   82: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   83: -define(acquire_schema(N, Config),
   84: 	mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
   85: 					    delete_schema,
   86: 					    {reload_appls, [mnesia]},
   87: 					    create_schema],
   88: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   89: -define(cleanup(N, Config),
   90: 	mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
   91: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   92: -define(trans(Fun),
   93: 	?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun))).
   94: 
   95: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   96:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   97: 
   98: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   99:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
  100: 
  101: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  102: 
  103: 
  104: all() -> 
  105:     [access_module, auto_repair, backup_module, debug, dir,
  106:      dump_log_load_regulation, {group, dump_log_thresholds},
  107:      dump_log_update_in_place,
  108:      event_module, backend_plugin_registration,
  109:      inconsistent_database, %% max_wait_for_decision,
  110:      send_compressed, app_test, {group, schema_config},
  111:      unknown_config].
  112: 
  113: groups() -> 
  114:     [{dump_log_thresholds, [],
  115:       [dump_log_time_threshold, dump_log_write_threshold]},
  116:      {schema_config, [],
  117:       [start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less,
  118:        start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full,
  119:        start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less,
  120:        schema_location_and_extra_db_nodes_combinations,
  121:        table_load_to_disc_less_nodes, schema_merge,
  122:        {group, dynamic_connect}]},
  123:      {dynamic_connect, [],
  124:       [dynamic_basic, dynamic_ext, dynamic_bad]}].
  125: 
  126: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  127:     Config.
  128: 
  129: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  130:     Config.
  131: 
  132: 
  133: 
  134: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  135: 
  136: access_module(doc) ->
  137:     ["Replace the activity access module with another module and ",
  138:      "use it to read and write to some alternate table storage"];
  139: access_module(suite) -> [];
  140: access_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  141:     Nodes = ?acquire_schema(1, Config),
  142:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{access_module, mnesia_frag}])),
  143: 
  144:     ?match(mnesia_frag, mnesia:system_info(access_module)),
  145: 
  146:     access_tab(ram_copies, Nodes),
  147:     case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  148: 	true -> skip;
  149: 	false -> 
  150: 	    access_tab(disc_copies, Nodes)
  151: 		,  access_tab(disc_only_copies, Nodes)
  152:     end,
  153: 
  154:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  155:     ?cleanup(1, Config).
  156: 
  157: access_tab(Storage, Nodes) ->
  158:     Tab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([access_tab_, Storage])),
  159:     RecName = some_access,
  160:     Attr = val,
  161:     TabDef = [{Storage, Nodes},
  162: 	      {type, bag},
  163: 	      {index, [Attr]},
  164: 	      {record_name, RecName}],
  165:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, TabDef)),
  166: 
  167:     Activity = fun(Kind) ->
  168: 		       A = [Kind, Tab, RecName, Attr, Nodes],
  169: 		       io:format("kind: ~w, storage: ~w~n", [Kind, Storage]),
  170: 		       mnesia:activity(Kind, fun do_access/5, A)
  171: 	       end,
  172:     ModActivity = fun(Kind, M) ->
  173: 			  io:format("kind: ~w, storage: ~w. module: ~w~n",
  174: 				    [Kind, Storage, M]),
  175: 			  A = [Kind, Tab, RecName, Attr, Nodes],
  176: 			  mnesia:activity(Kind, fun do_access/5, A, M)
  177: 	       end,
  178:     ?match(ok, Activity(transaction)),
  179:     ?match(ok, Activity({transaction, 47})),
  180:     ?match(ok, ModActivity(transaction, mnesia)),
  181:     ?match(ok, ModActivity(transaction, mnesia_frag)),
  182:     
  183:     ?match(ok, Activity(async_dirty)),
  184:     ?match(ok, Activity(sync_dirty)),
  185:     case Storage of
  186: 	ram_copies ->
  187: 	    ?match(ok, Activity(ets));
  188: 	_ ->
  189: 	    ignore
  190:     end.
  191: 
  192: do_access(Kind, Tab, RecName, Attr, Nodes) ->
  193:     Tens = lists:sort([{RecName, 1, 10}, {RecName, 3, 10}]),
  194:     {OptNodes, OptTens} = 
  195: 	case Kind of
  196: 	    transaction -> {Nodes, Tens};
  197: 	    {transaction, _} -> {Nodes, Tens};
  198: 	    async_dirty -> {[], Tens};
  199: 	    sync_dirty -> {[], Tens};
  200: 	    ets -> {[], []}
  201: 	end,
  202:     ?match(RecName, mnesia:table_info(Tab, record_name)),
  203:     
  204:     ?match(ok, mnesia:write(Tab, {RecName, 1, 10}, write)),
  205:     ?match(ok, mnesia:write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 20}, sticky_write)),
  206:     ?match(ok, mnesia:write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21}, sticky_write)),
  207:     ?match(ok, mnesia:write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 22}, write)),
  208:     ?match(ok, mnesia:write(Tab, {RecName, 3, 10}, write)),
  209: 
  210:     Twos = [{RecName, 2, 20}, {RecName, 2, 21}, {RecName, 2, 22}],
  211:     ?match(Twos, lists:sort(mnesia:read(Tab, 2, read))),
  212:     
  213:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_object(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21}, sticky_write)),
  214: 
  215:     TenPat = {RecName, '_', 10},
  216:     ?match(Tens, lists:sort(mnesia:match_object(Tab, TenPat, read))),
  217:     ?match(OptTens, lists:sort(mnesia:index_match_object(Tab, TenPat, Attr, read) )),
  218:     ?match(OptTens, lists:sort(mnesia:index_read(Tab, 10, Attr))),
  219:     Keys = [1, 2, 3],
  220:     ?match(Keys, lists:sort(mnesia:all_keys(Tab))),
  221: 
  222:     First = mnesia:first(Tab),
  223:     Mid   = mnesia:next(Tab, First),
  224:     Last  = mnesia:next(Tab, Mid),
  225:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia:next(Tab, Last)),
  226:     ?match(Keys, lists:sort([First,Mid,Last])),
  227: 
  228:     %% For set and bag these last, prev works as first and next
  229:     First2 = mnesia:last(Tab),
  230:     Mid2   = mnesia:prev(Tab, First2),
  231:     Last2  = mnesia:prev(Tab, Mid2),
  232:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia:prev(Tab, Last2)),
  233:     ?match(Keys, lists:sort([First2,Mid2,Last2])),
  234: 
  235:     ?match([ok, ok, ok], [mnesia:delete(Tab, K, write) || K <- Keys]),
  236:     W = wild_pattern,
  237:     ?match([], mnesia:match_object(Tab, mnesia:table_info(Tab, W), read)),
  238:     ?log("Safe fixed ~p~n", [catch ets:info(Tab, safe_fixed)]),
  239:     ?log("Fixed ~p ~n", [catch ets:info(Tab, fixed)]),
  240:     
  241:     ?match(OptNodes, mnesia:lock({global, some_lock_item, Nodes}, write)),
  242:     ?match(OptNodes, mnesia:lock({global, some_lock_item, Nodes}, read)),
  243:     ?match(OptNodes, mnesia:lock({table, Tab}, read)),
  244:     ?match(OptNodes, mnesia:lock({table, Tab}, write)),
  245:     
  246:     ok.
  247: 
  248: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  249: auto_repair(doc) ->
  250:     ["Try the auto_repair mechanism on the various disk_logs and dets files.",
  251:      "",
  252:      "The case tests both normal values of the parameter, and also",
  253:      "one crazy value.",
  254:      "The test of the real auto_repair functionality is made in the",
  255:      "dets suite"
  256:     ];
  257: auto_repair(suite) -> [];
  258: auto_repair(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  259:     ?init(1, Config),
  260:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),			% Check default true
  261:     ?match(true, mnesia:system_info(auto_repair)),
  262:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  263:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{auto_repair, true}])),
  264:     ?match(true, mnesia:system_info(auto_repair)),
  265:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  266:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{auto_repair, false}])),
  267:     ?match(false, mnesia:system_info(auto_repair)),
  268:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  269:     ?match({error, {bad_type, auto_repair, your_mama}},
  270: 	   mnesia:start([{auto_repair, your_mama}])),
  271:      ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  272:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  273:     ok.
  274: 
  275: 
  276: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  277: 
  278: backup_module(doc) ->
  279:     ["Replace the backup module with another module and use it to",
  280:      "read and write to an alternate backup media, e.g stored in",
  281:      "the internal state of a simple process."];
  282: backup_module(suite) -> [];
  283: backup_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  284:     Nodes = ?acquire_schema(1, Config),
  285:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{backup_module, mnesia_config_backup}])),
  286:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  287: 	   mnesia:create_table(test_table,
  288: 			       [{disc_copies, Nodes},
  289: 				{attributes,
  290: 				 record_info(fields,test_table)}])),
  291:     
  292:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  293: 	   mnesia:create_table(test_table2,
  294: 			       [{disc_copies, Nodes},
  295: 				{attributes,
  296: 				 record_info(fields,test_table2)}])),
  297:     %% Write in test table 
  298:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table{i=1}) end),
  299:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table{i=2}) end),
  300:     
  301:     %% Write in test table 2
  302:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table2{i=3}) end),
  303:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table2{i=4}) end),
  304:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables(Nodes, [test_table, test_table2]),
  305:     
  306:     File = whow,
  307:     %% Now make a backup
  308:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup(File)),
  309: 
  310:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback(File)),
  311:     
  312:     %% Now add things
  313:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table{i=2.5}) end),
  314:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table2{i=3.5}) end),
  315: 
  316:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  317:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  318:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [test_table, test_table2])),
  319: 
  320:     %% Now check newly started tables
  321:     ?match({atomic, [1,2]},
  322: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> lists:sort(mnesia:all_keys(test_table)) end)),
  323:     ?match({atomic, [3,4]},
  324: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> lists:sort(mnesia:all_keys(test_table2)) end)),
  325: 
  326:     %% Test some error cases
  327:     mnesia:set_debug_level(debug),
  328:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:install_fallback("NonExisting.FILE")),
  329:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:install_fallback(filename:join(mnesia_lib:dir(), "LATEST.LOG"))),
  330: 
  331:     %% Cleanup
  332:     file:delete(File),
  333:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  334:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  335:     ok.
  336: 
  337: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  338: debug(doc) ->
  339:     ["Try out the four debug levels and ensure that the",
  340:     "expected events are generated."];
  341: debug(suite) -> [];
  342: debug(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  343:     Nodes = ?init(1, Config),
  344:     case application:get_env(mnesia,debug) of
  345: 	undefined ->
  346: 	    ?match(none, mnesia:system_info(debug));
  347: 	{ok, false} ->
  348: 	    ?match(none, mnesia:system_info(debug));
  349: 	{ok, true} ->
  350: 	    ?match(debug, mnesia:system_info(debug));
  351: 	{ok, Env} ->
  352: 	    ?match(Env, mnesia:system_info(debug))
  353:     end,
  354: 
  355:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{debug, verbose}])),
  356:     ?match(verbose, mnesia:system_info(debug)),
  357:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  358:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  359: 
  360:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{debug, debug}])),
  361:     ?match(debug, mnesia:system_info(debug)),
  362:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  363:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  364: 
  365:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{debug, trace}])),
  366:     ?match(trace, mnesia:system_info(debug)),
  367:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  368:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  369: 
  370:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{debug, true}])),
  371:     ?match(debug, mnesia:system_info(debug)),
  372:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  373:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  374: 
  375:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{debug, false}])),
  376:     ?match(none, mnesia:system_info(debug)),
  377: 
  378:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  379:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  380:     ok.
  381: 
  382: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  383: dir(doc) ->
  384:     ["Try to use alternate Mnesia directories"];
  385: dir(suite) -> [];
  386: dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  387:     Nodes = ?init(1, Config),
  388: 
  389:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{dir, tuff}])),
  390:     Dir = filename:join([element(2, file:get_cwd()), "tuff"]),
  391:     ?match(Dir, mnesia:system_info(directory)),
  392:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  393:  
  394:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  395:     ok.
  396: 
  397: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  398: dump_log_update_in_place(doc) ->
  399:     ["Change the update in place policy for the transaction log dumper."];
  400: dump_log_update_in_place(suite) -> [];
  401: dump_log_update_in_place(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  402:     Nodes = ?acquire(1, Config),
  403:     ?match(true, mnesia:system_info(dump_log_update_in_place)),
  404:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  405: 	   mnesia:create_table(test_table,
  406: 			       [{disc_copies, Nodes},
  407: 				{attributes,
  408: 				 record_info(fields,test_table)}])),
  409:     
  410:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  411:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  412:     
  413:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{dump_log_update_in_place, false}])),
  414:     ?match(false, mnesia:system_info(dump_log_update_in_place)),
  415: 
  416:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables(Nodes, [schema, test_table]),
  417: 
  418:     %% Now provoke some log dumps
  419: 
  420:     L = lists:map(
  421: 	  fun(Num) ->
  422: 		  %% Write something on one end ...
  423: 		  mnesia:transaction(
  424: 		    fun() ->
  425: 			    mnesia:write(#test_table{i=Num}) end
  426: 		   ) end,
  427: 	  lists:seq(1, 110)),
  428:     
  429:     L2 = lists:duplicate(110, {atomic, ok}),
  430: 
  431:     %% If this fails then some of the 110 writes above failed
  432:     ?match(true, L==L2),
  433:     if  L==L2 -> ok;
  434: 	true -> 
  435: 	    ?verbose("***** List1 len: ~p, List2 len: ~p~n",
  436: 		      [length(L), length(L2)]),
  437: 	    ?verbose("L: ~p~nL2:~p~n", [L, L2])
  438:     end,
  439:     
  440:     %% If we still can write, then Mnesia is probably alive
  441:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table{i=115}) end),
  442:     
  443:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  444:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  445:     ok.
  446: 
  447: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  448: 
  449: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  450: dump_log_write_threshold(doc)->
  451:     ["This test case must be rewritten.",
  452:      "Dump logs are tested by doing transactions, then killing Mnesia and ",
  453:      "then examining the table data files and see if they are correct.",
  454:      "The test_table is used as a counter, test_table. is stepped once ",
  455:      "for each transaction."];
  456: dump_log_write_threshold(suite)->[];
  457: dump_log_write_threshold(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  458:     [N1] = ?acquire_schema(1, Config),
  459: 
  460:     Threshold = 3,
  461:     ?match(ok,mnesia:start([{dump_log_write_threshold, Threshold}])),
  462: 
  463:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  464: 	   mnesia:create_table(test_table,
  465: 			       [{disc_copies, [N1]},
  466: 				{attributes,
  467: 				 record_info(fields,test_table)}])),
  468:     ?match(dumped, mnesia:dump_log()),
  469:     
  470:     ?match(ok, do_trans(2)),				% Shall not have dumped
  471:     check_logs(0),
  472:     
  473:     ?match(ok, do_trans(Threshold - 2)),			% Trigger a dump
  474:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  475:     check_logs(Threshold),
  476: 
  477:     
  478:     ?match(ok, do_trans(Threshold - 1)),   
  479:     ?match(dumped, mnesia:dump_log()),   %% This should trigger ets2dcd dump
  480:     check_logs(0),                       %% and leave no dcl file
  481:     
  482:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  483: 
  484:     %% Check bad threshold value
  485:     ?match({error,{bad_type,dump_log_write_threshold,0}},
  486: 	   mnesia:start([{dump_log_write_threshold,0}])),
  487: 
  488:     ?verify_mnesia([], [N1]),
  489:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  490:     ok.
  491: 
  492: 
  493: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  494: dump_log_time_threshold(doc)->
  495:     ["See doc on above."];
  496: dump_log_time_threshold(suite)->[];
  497: dump_log_time_threshold(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  498:     Nodes = ?acquire_schema(1, Config),
  499:     Time = 4000,
  500: 
  501:     %% Check bad threshold value
  502:     ?match({error,{bad_type,dump_log_time_threshold,0}},
  503: 	   mnesia:start([{dump_log_time_threshold,0}])),
  504:     
  505:     
  506:     ?match(ok,mnesia:start([{dump_log_write_threshold,100},
  507: 			    {dump_log_time_threshold, Time}])),
  508:     
  509:     ?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:create_table(test_table,
  510: 					   [{disc_copies, Nodes},
  511: 					    {attributes,
  512: 					     record_info(fields,
  513: 							 test_table)}])),
  514:     
  515:     %% Check that nothing is dumped when within time threshold
  516:     ?match(ok, do_trans(1)),
  517:     check_logs(0),
  518:     
  519:     ?match(Time, mnesia:system_info(dump_log_time_threshold)),
  520: 
  521:     %% Check that things get dumped when time threshold exceeded
  522:     ?match(ok, do_trans(5)),
  523:     receive after Time+2000 -> ok end,
  524:     check_logs(6),
  525:     
  526:     ?verify_mnesia([node()], []),
  527:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  528:     ok.
  529: 
  530: %%%%%%%%
  531: %% 
  532: %% Help functions for dump log
  533: 
  534: %% Do a transaction N times
  535: do_trans(0) -> ok;
  536: do_trans(N) ->
  537:     Fun = fun() ->
  538: 		  XX=incr(),
  539: 		  mnesia:write(#test_table{i=XX})
  540: 	  end,
  541:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:transaction(Fun),
  542:     do_trans(N-1).
  543: 
  544: %% An increasing number
  545: incr() ->
  546:     case get(bloody_counter) of
  547: 	undefined -> put(bloody_counter, 2), 1;
  548: 	Num -> put(bloody_counter, Num+1)
  549:     end.
  550: 
  551: %%
  552: %% Check that the correct number of transactions have been recorded.
  553: %%-record(test_table,{i,a1,a2,a3}).
  554: check_logs(N) ->    
  555:     File = mnesia_lib:tab2dcl(test_table),    
  556:     Args = [{file, File}, {name, testing}, {repair, true}, {mode, read_only}],
  557: 
  558:     if N == 0 ->
  559: 	    ?match(false, mnesia_lib:exists(File));
  560:        true ->
  561: 	    ?match(true, mnesia_lib:exists(File)),
  562: 	    ?match({ok, _Log}, disk_log:open(Args)),
  563: 	    
  564: 	    {Cont, Terms} = disk_log:chunk(testing, start),
  565: 	    ?match(eof, disk_log:chunk(testing, Cont)),
  566: 	    %%?verbose("N: ~p, L: ~p~n", [N, L]),
  567: 	    disk_log:close(testing),
  568: 	    
  569: 	    %% Correct number of records in file
  570: 	    ?match({N, N}, {N, length(Terms) -1 })  %% Ignore Header
  571:     end.
  572: 
  573: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  574: 
  575: dump_log_load_regulation(doc) ->
  576:     ["Test the load regulation of the dumper"];
  577: dump_log_load_regulation(suite) ->
  578:     [];
  579: dump_log_load_regulation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  580:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  581:     Param = dump_log_load_regulation,
  582: 
  583:     %% Normal 
  584:     NoReg = false,
  585:     ?match(NoReg, mnesia:system_info(Param)),
  586:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
  587: 
  588:     %% Bad
  589:     Bad = arne_anka,
  590:     ?match({error, {bad_type, Param, Bad}},
  591: 	   mnesia:start([{Param, Bad}])),
  592: 
  593:     %% Regulation activated
  594:     Reg = true,
  595:     ?match(ok,mnesia:start([{Param, Reg}])),
  596:     ?match(Reg, mnesia:system_info(Param)),
  597: 
  598:     Args =
  599: 	[{db_nodes, Nodes},
  600: 	 {driver_nodes, Nodes},
  601: 	 {replica_nodes, Nodes},
  602: 	 {n_drivers_per_node, 5},
  603: 	 {n_branches, length(Nodes) * 10},
  604: 	 {n_accounts_per_branch, 5},
  605: 	 {replica_type, disc_copies},
  606: 	 {stop_after, timer:seconds(15)},
  607: 	 {report_interval, timer:seconds(3)},
  608: 	 {use_running_mnesia, true},
  609: 	 {reuse_history_id, true}],
  610:     
  611:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(Args)),
  612:     
  613:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  614:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  615:     ok.
  616: 
  617: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  618: 
  619: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  620: 
  621: max_wait_for_decision(doc) ->
  622:     ["Provoke Mnesia to make a forced decision of the outome",
  623:      "of a heavy weight transaction."].
  624:      
  625: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  626: 
  627: send_compressed(doc) -> [];
  628: send_compressed(suite) -> [];
  629: send_compressed(Config) ->
  630:     [N1,N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  631:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t0, [{ram_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  632:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t1, [{disc_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  633:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t2, [{disc_only_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  634: 
  635:     Max = 1000,
  636:     Create = fun(Tab) -> [mnesia:write({Tab, N, {N, "FILLER-123490878345asdasd"}})
  637: 			  || N <- lists:seq(1, Max)],
  638: 			 ok
  639: 	     end,
  640:     
  641:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
  642:     sys:get_status(mnesia_monitor), %% sync N1
  643:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
  644:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start([{send_compressed, 9}])),
  645:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([t0,t1,t2], 25000)),
  646: 
  647:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Create, [t0])),
  648:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Create, [t1])),
  649:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Create, [t2])),
  650:     
  651:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N2], [t0,t1,t2])),
  652:     
  653:     Verify = fun(Tab) ->		     
  654: 		     [ [{Tab,N,{N,_}}] = mnesia:read(Tab, N) || N <- lists:seq(1, Max)],
  655: 		     ok
  656: 	     end,
  657:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, [Verify, [t0]])),
  658:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, [Verify, [t1]])),
  659:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, [Verify, [t2]])),
  660:     
  661:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [Verify, [t0]])),
  662:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [Verify, [t1]])),
  663:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [Verify, [t2]])),
  664:     
  665:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  666:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  667:     ok.
  668: 
  669: app_test(doc) -> [];
  670: app_test(suite) -> [];
  671: app_test(_Config) ->
  672:     ?match(ok,test_server:app_test(mnesia)),
  673:     ok.
  674: 
  675: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  676: 
  677: event_module(doc) ->
  678:     ["Replace the event module with another module and use it as",
  679:      "receiver of the various system and table events. Provoke",
  680:      "coverage of all kinds of events."];
  681: event_module(suite) -> [];
  682: event_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  683:     Filter = fun({mnesia_system_event,{mnesia_info, _, _}}) -> false;
  684: 		(_) -> true
  685: 	     end,
  686:     
  687:     [_N1, N2]=Nodes=?acquire_schema(2, Config),
  688: 
  689:     Def = case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of 
  690: 	      true -> [{event_module, mnesia_config_event},
  691: 		       {extra_db_nodes, Nodes}];
  692: 	      false  ->
  693: 		  [{event_module, mnesia_config_event}]
  694: 	  end,
  695: 
  696:     ?match({[ok, ok], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, start, [Def])),
  697:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  698:     mnesia_event ! {get_log, self()},
  699:     DebugLog1 = receive
  700: 		    {log, L1} -> L1
  701: 		after 10000 -> [timeout]
  702: 		end,
  703:     ?match([{mnesia_system_event,{mnesia_up,N2}}],
  704: 	   lists:filter(Filter, DebugLog1)),
  705:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2]),
  706:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  707: 
  708:     ?match({[ok], []}, rpc:multicall([N2], mnesia, start, [])),
  709: 
  710:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  711:     mnesia_event ! {get_log, self()},
  712:     DebugLog = receive
  713: 		   {log, L} -> L
  714: 	       after 10000 -> [timeout]
  715: 	       end,
  716:     ?match([{mnesia_system_event,{mnesia_up,N2}},
  717: 	    {mnesia_system_event,{mnesia_down,N2}},
  718: 	    {mnesia_system_event,{mnesia_up, N2}}],
  719: 	   lists:filter(Filter, DebugLog)),
  720:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  721:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  722:     ok.
  723: 
  724: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  725: 
  726: backend_plugin_registration(doc) ->
  727:     ["Ensure that backend plugins can be registered at runtime,",
  728:      "that the init_backend is called exactly once when registering",
  729:      "a plugin, and not again when registering a new alias"];
  730: backend_plugin_registration(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  731:     Nodes = ?acquire_schema(1, [{default_properties, []} | Config]),
  732:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  733:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:add_backend_type(ext_ets, ext_test)),
  734:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:add_backend_type(ext_dets, ext_test)),
  735:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  736:     ?cleanup(1, Config).
  737:

  739: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  740: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  741: start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less(doc)->
  742:     ["Start a disk node and then a disk less one. Distribute some",
  743:      "tables between them."];
  744: start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less(suite) -> [];
  745: start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  746:     [N1, N2] = ?init(2, Config),
  747:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema([N1])),
  748:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1])),
  749: 
  750:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
  751: 
  752:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  753: 					     {extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
  754:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [schema]),
  755: 
  756:     %% Now create some tables
  757:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  758: 	   mnesia:create_table(test_table,
  759: 			       [{ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  760: 				{attributes,
  761: 				 record_info(fields,test_table)}])),
  762:     
  763:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  764: 	   rpc:call(
  765: 	     N2, mnesia,create_table, [test_table2,
  766: 				      [{ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  767: 				       {attributes,
  768: 					record_info(fields,test_table2)}]])),
  769: 
  770:     %% Write something on one end ...
  771:     Rec = #test_table{i=55},
  772:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  773: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec) end)),
  774:     
  775:     %% ... and read it in the other
  776:     ?match({atomic, [Rec]},
  777: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, 
  778: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table, 55}) end])),
  779:     
  780:     
  781:     %% Then do the same but start at the other end
  782:     Rec2 = #test_table2{i=155},
  783:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  784: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, 
  785: 		    [fun() ->
  786: 			     mnesia:write(Rec2) end
  787: 		    ])),
  788:     
  789:     ?match({atomic, [Rec2]},
  790: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table2, 155}) end)),
  791:     
  792:     ?verify_mnesia([N1, N2], []),
  793:     ?cleanup(2, Config),
  794:     ok.
  795:     
  796: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  797: start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full(doc)->
  798:     ["no_doc"];
  799: start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full(suite) -> [];
  800: start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  801:     [N1, N2] = Nodes = ?init(2, Config),
  802:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema([N1])),
  803:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1])),
  804: 
  805:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
  806:     
  807:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  808: 					     {extra_db_nodes, Nodes}]])),
  809: 
  810:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [schema]),
  811:     
  812:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
  813:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  814:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes)),
  815: 
  816:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [schema]),
  817:     
  818:     %% Now create some tables
  819:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  820: 	   rpc:call(
  821: 	     N1, mnesia,create_table, [test_table,
  822: 				       [%%{disc_copies, [node()]},
  823: 					{ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  824: 					{attributes,
  825: 					 record_info(fields,test_table)}]])),
  826:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [test_table]),
  827: 
  828:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  829: 	   rpc:call(
  830: 	     N2, mnesia,create_table, [test_table2,
  831: 				       [%%{disc_copies, [node()]},
  832: 					{ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  833: 					{attributes,
  834: 					 record_info(fields,test_table2)}]])),
  835:     
  836:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [test_table, test_table2]),
  837: 
  838:     %% Assure tables loaded
  839:     ?match({[ok, ok], []},
  840: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia, wait_for_tables,
  841: 			 [[schema, test_table, test_table2], 10000])),
  842:     
  843:     %% Write something on one end ...
  844:     Rec = #test_table{i=55},
  845:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  846: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, 
  847: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec) end])),
  848:     
  849:     %% ... and read it in the other
  850:     ?match({atomic, [Rec]},
  851: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, 
  852: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table, 55}) end])),
  853:     
  854:     %% Then do the same but start at the other end
  855:     Rec2 = #test_table2{i=155},
  856:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  857: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, 
  858: 		    [fun() ->
  859: 			     mnesia:write(Rec2) end
  860: 		    ])),
  861:     
  862:     ?match({atomic, [Rec2]},
  863: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, 
  864: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table2, 155}) end])),
  865:     
  866:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  867:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  868:     ok.
  869: 
  870: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  871: start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less(doc)->
  872:     ["no doc"];
  873: start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less(suite) -> [];
  874: start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  875:     Nodes = [N1, N2, N3] = ?init(3, Config),
  876: 
  877:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram}]])),
  878: 
  879:     %% Really should use test_lib:mnesia_start for these ones but ...
  880:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  881: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia,add_table_copy, [schema, N2, ram_copies])),
  882:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  883: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia,add_table_copy, [schema, N3, ram_copies])),
  884:     
  885:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  886: 					     {extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
  887:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  888: 					     {extra_db_nodes, [N1, N2]}]])),
  889: 
  890:     %% Now create some tables
  891:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  892: 	   rpc:call(
  893: 	     N1, mnesia,create_table, [test_table,
  894: 				      [%%{disc_copies, [node()]},
  895: 				       {ram_copies, [N1, N2, N3]},
  896: 				       {attributes,
  897: 					record_info(fields,test_table)}]])),
  898: 
  899:     %% Assure tables loaded
  900:     ?match({[ok, ok, ok], []},
  901: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2, N3], mnesia, wait_for_tables,
  902: 			 [[test_table], 1000])),
  903: 
  904:     %% Write something on one end ...
  905:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  906: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, 
  907: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table{i=44}) end])),
  908: 
  909:     %% Force synchronicity
  910:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  911: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, 
  912: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write_lock_table(test_table) end])),
  913:     
  914:     %% ... and read it in the others
  915:     ?match({[{atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]},
  916: 	     {atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]}], []},
  917: 	   rpc:multicall([N2, N3], mnesia, transaction, 
  918: 			 [fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table, 44}) end])),
  919:     
  920:     %% Then do the other way around
  921:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  922: 	   rpc:call(N3, mnesia, transaction, 
  923: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table{i=33}) end])),
  924:     %% Force synchronicity
  925:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  926: 	   rpc:call(N3, mnesia, transaction, 
  927: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write_lock_table(test_table) end])),
  928:     
  929:     ?match({[{atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]},
  930: 	     {atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]}], []},
  931: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia, transaction, 
  932: 			 [fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table, 44}) end])),
  933: 
  934:     mnesia_test_lib:reload_appls([mnesia], Nodes),
  935:     ok.
  936: 
  937: 
  938: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  965: table_load_to_disc_less_nodes(doc)->
  966:     ["Load tables to disc less nodes"];
  967: table_load_to_disc_less_nodes(suite) -> [];
  968: table_load_to_disc_less_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  969:     [N1, N2] = ?init(2, Config),
  970: 
  971:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram}]])),
  972: 
  973:     %% Really should use test_lib:mnesia_start for these ones but ...
  974:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  975: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia,add_table_copy, [schema, N2, ram_copies])),
  976:     
  977:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  978: 					     {extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
  979: 
  980:     %% Now create some tables
  981:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  982: 	   rpc:call(
  983: 	     N1, mnesia,create_table, [test_table,
  984: 				      [%%{disc_copies, [node()]},
  985: 				       {ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  986: 				       {attributes,
  987: 					record_info(fields,test_table)}]])),
  988: 
  989:     %% Assure tables loaded
  990:     ?match({[ok, ok], []},
  991: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia, wait_for_tables,
  992: 			 [[test_table], 1000])),
  993: 
  994:     %% Write something on one end ...
  995:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  996: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, 
  997: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table{i=44}) end])),
  998: 
  999:     %% Force synchronicity
 1000:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1001: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, 
 1002: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write_lock_table(test_table) end])),
 1003:     
 1004:     %% ... and read it in the others
 1005:     ?match({atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]},
 1006: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, 
 1007: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table, 44}) end])),
 1008: 
 1009:     ?cleanup(2, Config),
 1010:     ok.
 1011:     
 1012: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1013: schema_merge(doc) ->
 1014:     ["Provoke various schema merge situations.",
 1015:      "Perform various schema updates while some nodes are down,",
 1016:      "stop the started nodes, start the stopped nodes and perform",
 1017:      "schema updates. Now we have a situation were some of the table",
 1018:      "definitions have been changed on two or more nodes independently",
 1019:      "of each other and when Mnesia on the nodes tries to connect",
 1020:      "to each other at restart the schema will be merged.",
 1021:      "Do also try to provoke schema merge situations were the",
 1022:      "schema cannot be merged."];
 1023: 
 1024: schema_merge(suite) -> [];
 1025: 
 1026: schema_merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1027:     [N1, N2]=Nodes=?acquire(2,Config),
 1028:     
 1029:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2]),    
 1030:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1031: 
 1032:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),    
 1033:     ?match({atomic,ok},
 1034: 	   rpc:call(
 1035: 	     N1, mnesia,create_table, 
 1036: 	     [test_table,
 1037: 	      [{Storage, [N1]},
 1038: 	       {attributes,
 1039: 		record_info(fields,test_table)}]])),
 1040:     
 1041:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1042: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, 
 1043: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table{i=44}) end])),
 1044: 
 1045:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1]),
 1046:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 1047:     %% Can't use std start because it waits for schema
 1048:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [])),
 1049: 
 1050:     ?match({atomic,ok},
 1051: 	   rpc:call(
 1052: 	     N2, mnesia,create_table, 
 1053: 	     [test_table2,
 1054: 	      [{Storage, [N2]},
 1055: 	       {attributes,
 1056: 		record_info(fields,test_table2)}]])),
 1057:     
 1058:     receive after 5000 -> ok end,
 1059: 
 1060:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1061: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, 
 1062: 		    [fun() -> mnesia:write(#test_table2{i=33}) end])),
 1063:     
 1064:     %% Can't use std start because it waits for schema
 1065:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [])),
 1066: 
 1067:     %% Assure tables loaded
 1068:     ?match({[ok, ok], []},
 1069: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia, wait_for_tables,
 1070: 			 [[schema, test_table, test_table2], 10000])),
 1071:     
 1072:     %% ... and read it in the others
 1073:     ?match({[{atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]},
 1074: 	     {atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]}], []},
 1075: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia, transaction, 
 1076: 			 [fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table, 44}) end])),
 1077:     
 1078:     ?match({[{atomic, [{test_table2, 33, _}]},
 1079: 	     {atomic, [{test_table2, 33, _}]}], []},
 1080: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia, transaction, 
 1081: 			 [fun() -> mnesia:read({test_table2, 33}) end])),
 1082:     
 1083:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
 1084:     ?cleanup(2, Config),
 1085:     ok.
 1086: 
 1087: 
 1088: -define(connect(Nodes), mnesia:change_config(extra_db_nodes, Nodes)).
 1089: -define(rpc_connect(From, Nodes), 
 1090: 	rpc:call(From, mnesia, change_config, [extra_db_nodes, Nodes])).
 1091: 
 1092: 
 1093: sort({ok, NS}) ->
 1094:     {ok, lists:sort(NS)};
 1095: sort(Ns) when is_tuple(Ns) ->
 1096:     Ns;
 1097: sort(NS) when is_list(NS) -> 
 1098:     lists:sort(NS).
 1099: 
 1100: 
 1101: 
 1102: 
 1103: dynamic_basic(suite) -> [];
 1104: dynamic_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1105:     Nodes = [N1, N2, N3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1106:     SNs = lists:sort(Nodes),    
 1107: 
 1108:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab1, [{ram_copies, Nodes--[N1]}, {disc_copies, [N1]}])),
 1109:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab2, [{disc_copies, Nodes}])),
 1110: 
 1111:     ?match({ok, SNs}, sort(?rpc_connect(N1, Nodes))),     %% What shall happen?
 1112:     ?match({ok, []}, sort(?rpc_connect(N1, [nonode@nothosted]))),  %% What shall happen?
 1113:     
 1114:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
 1115:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N2])),
 1116: 
 1117:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({tab1, 1, 1})),
 1118:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({tab2, 1, 1})),
 1119: 
 1120:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1]}, {schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1121:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab1,tab2],5000])),
 1122:     io:format("Here ~p ~n",[?LINE]), 
 1123:     check_storage(N2, N1, [N3]),
 1124:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1125:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1126: 
 1127:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
 1128:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N3])),
 1129:     
 1130:     io:format("T1 ~p ~n",[rpc:call(N3,?MODULE,c_nodes,[])]),
 1131:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, start, [[{schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1132:     io:format("T2 ~p ~n",[rpc:call(N3,?MODULE,c_nodes,[])]),
 1133:     timer:sleep(2000),
 1134:     io:format("T3 ~p ~n",[rpc:call(N3,?MODULE,c_nodes,[])]),
 1135:     ?match({ok, [N1]}, sort(?rpc_connect(N3, [N1]))),
 1136:     io:format("T4 ~p ~n",[rpc:call(N3,?MODULE,c_nodes,[])]),
 1137:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab1,tab2],5000])),
 1138:     io:format("Here ~p ~n",[?LINE]), 
 1139:     check_storage(N3, N1, [N2]),
 1140:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1141:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1142:     
 1143:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
 1144:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N3])),
 1145:     
 1146:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, start, [[{schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1147:     ?match({ok, [N3]}, sort(?rpc_connect(N1, [N3]))),
 1148:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab1,tab2],5000])),
 1149:     io:format("Here ~p ~n",[?LINE]), 
 1150:     check_storage(N3, N1, [N2]),
 1151:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1152:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1153: 
 1154:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2]),
 1155:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N2])),
 1156:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, N2)),
 1157: 
 1158:     % Ok, we have now removed references to node N2 from the other nodes
 1159:     % mnesia should come up now.
 1160:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(tab1, N2, ram_copies)),
 1161: 
 1162:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1163:     ?match({ok, _}, sort(?rpc_connect(N2, [N3]))),
 1164:     
 1165:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1166:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1167:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1168: 
 1169:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab1], 1000])),
 1170:     ?match([{tab1, 1, 1}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [tab1, 1])),
 1171:        
 1172:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2]),
 1173: 
 1174:     %%% SYNC!!!
 1175:     timer:sleep(1000),
 1176:     sys:get_status(mnesia_monitor),
 1177: 
 1178:     ?match([N3,N1], sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1179:     ?match([N3,N1], sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1180:     
 1181:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1182:     ?match({ok, _}, sort(?rpc_connect(N3, [N2]))),
 1183:     
 1184:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1185:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1186:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1187: 
 1188:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab1], 1000])),
 1189:     ?match([{tab1, 1, 1}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [tab1, 1])),
 1190: 
 1191:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
 1192: %%    ?cleanup(3, Config).
 1193:     ok.
 1194: 
 1195: c_nodes() -> 		  						
 1196:     {mnesia_lib:val({current, db_nodes}),mnesia_lib:val(recover_nodes)}.
 1197: 
 1198: 
 1199: dynamic_ext(suite) ->    [];
 1200: dynamic_ext(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1201:     Ns = [N1,N2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1202:     SNs = lists:sort([N1,N2]),
 1203:     
 1204:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab0, [{disc_copies, [N1,N2]}])),
 1205:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab1, [{ram_copies, [N2]}])),
 1206:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab2, [{disc_copies, [N2]}])),
 1207:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab3, [{disc_only_copies, [N2]}])),
 1208:     
 1209:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2]),
 1210:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N2])),
 1211:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1]}, {schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1212:     
 1213:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1214:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1215:     
 1216:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab0,tab1,tab2,tab3], 2000])),
 1217: 
 1218:     Check = fun({Tab,Storage}) ->
 1219: 		    ?match(Storage, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, storage_type])),
 1220: 		    ?match([{N2,Storage}], 
 1221: 			   lists:sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, where_to_commit])))
 1222: 	    end,
 1223:     [Check(Test) || Test <- [{tab1, ram_copies},{tab2, disc_copies},{tab3, disc_only_copies}]],
 1224:     
 1225:     T = erlang:unique_integer(),
 1226:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({tab0, 42, T})),
 1227:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({tab1, 42, T})),
 1228:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({tab2, 42, T})),
 1229:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({tab3, 42, T})),
 1230:     
 1231:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1232:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1233:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1234:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([tab0,tab1,tab2,tab3], 10000)),
 1235:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab1,tab2,tab3], 100])),
 1236:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({tab1, 41})),
 1237:     ?match([{tab2,42,T}], mnesia:dirty_read({tab2, 42})),
 1238:     ?match([{tab3,42,T}], mnesia:dirty_read({tab3, 42})),
 1239: 
 1240:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2]),
 1241:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N2])),
 1242: 
 1243:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1244: 
 1245:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes,[N1,N2]}, {schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1246:     ?match({timeout,[tab0]}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 500])),
 1247: 
 1248:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1,N2]}]])),
 1249:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 1500])),
 1250:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 1500])),
 1251:     ?match([{tab0,42,T}], mnesia:dirty_read({tab0, 42})),
 1252:     ?match([{tab0,42,T}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia,dirty_read,[{tab0,42}])),
 1253: 
 1254:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1255:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2]),
 1256:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema([N2])),
 1257:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1,N2]}, {schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1258:     ?match({timeout,[tab0]}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 500])),
 1259: 
 1260:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes,[N1,N2]}]])),
 1261:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 1500])),
 1262:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 1500])),
 1263:     ?match([{tab0,42,T}], mnesia:dirty_read({tab0, 42})),
 1264:     ?match([{tab0,42,T}], rpc:call(N2,mnesia,dirty_read,[{tab0,42}])),
 1265: 
 1266:     ?verify_mnesia(Ns, []),
 1267:     ok.
 1268: 
 1269: check_storage(Me, Orig, Other) ->
 1270:     io:format("Nodes ~p ~p ~p~n",[Me,Orig,Other]),
 1271:     rpc:multicall(Other, sys, status, [mnesia_locker]),
 1272:     rpc:call(Me, sys, status, [mnesia_locker]),
 1273:     rpc:call(Orig, sys, status, [mnesia_locker]),
 1274:     rpc:multicall(Other, sys, status, [mnesia_controller]),
 1275:     rpc:call(Me, sys, status, [mnesia_controller]),
 1276:     rpc:call(Orig, sys, status, [mnesia_controller]),
 1277:     %% Verify disc_copies
 1278:     W2C = lists:sort([{Node,disc_copies} || Node <- [Me,Orig|Other]]),
 1279:     W2W = lists:sort([Me,Orig|Other]),
 1280:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Orig, mnesia, table_info, [schema, storage_type])),
 1281:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Me, mnesia, table_info, [schema, storage_type])),
 1282:     ?match(W2C, lists:sort(rpc:call(Orig, mnesia, table_info, [schema, where_to_commit]))),
 1283:     ?match(W2C, lists:sort(rpc:call(Me, mnesia, table_info, [schema, where_to_commit]))),
 1284:     
 1285:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Orig, mnesia, table_info, [tab2, storage_type])),
 1286:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Me, mnesia, table_info, [tab2, storage_type])),    
 1287:     ?match(W2W, lists:sort(rpc:call(Me, mnesia, table_info, [tab2, where_to_write]))),    
 1288:     ?match(Me, rpc:call(Me, mnesia, table_info, [tab2, where_to_read])),    
 1289:     
 1290:     ?match(W2C, lists:sort(rpc:call(Orig, mnesia, table_info, [tab2, where_to_commit]))),
 1291:     ?match(W2C, lists:sort(rpc:call(Me, mnesia, table_info, [tab2, where_to_commit]))),
 1292:     
 1293:     ?match([{tab1,1,1}], mnesia:dirty_read(tab1,1)),
 1294:     ?match([{tab2,1,1}], mnesia:dirty_read(tab2,1)),
 1295:     ?match([{tab1,1,1}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia, dirty_read, [tab1,1])),
 1296:     ?match([{tab2,1,1}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia, dirty_read, [tab2,1])),
 1297: 
 1298:     ?match(true, rpc:call(Me, mnesia_monitor, use_dir, [])),
 1299:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Me, mnesia_lib, val, [{schema, storage_type}])),
 1300:     
 1301:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Orig]),
 1302:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Other),
 1303:     T = erlang:unique_integer(),
 1304:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Me, mnesia, dirty_write, [{tab2, 42, T}])),
 1305:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Me, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1306:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Me, mnesia, start, [])),   
 1307:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Orig|Other], [tab1,tab2])),
 1308:     ?match([{tab2,42,T}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia, dirty_read, [{tab2, 42}])),
 1309:     ?match([{tab2,42,T}], rpc:call(Orig, mnesia, dirty_read, [{tab2, 42}])),
 1310:     
 1311:     ?match([{tab1,1,1}], mnesia:dirty_read(tab1,1)),
 1312:     ?match([{tab2,1,1}], mnesia:dirty_read(tab2,1)),
 1313:     ?match([{tab1,1,1}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia, dirty_read, [tab1,1])),
 1314:     ?match([{tab2,1,1}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia, dirty_read, [tab2,1])),    
 1315:     ok.
 1316:     
 1317: 
 1318: dynamic_bad(suite) ->    [];
 1319: dynamic_bad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1320:     Ns = [N1, N2, N3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1321:     SNs = lists:sort([N2,N3]), 
 1322: 
 1323:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
 1324:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, N3, ram_copies)),
 1325:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(tab1, [{ram_copies, Ns -- [N1]},
 1326: 						    {disc_copies, [N1]}])),
 1327:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({tab1, 1, 1})),
 1328:     
 1329:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Ns),
 1330:     ?match({[ok, ok], []}, rpc:multicall(Ns -- [N1], mnesia, start, [])),
 1331:     ?match({ok, [N2]}, ?rpc_connect(N3, [N2])),
 1332:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1333:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1334:     ?match({badrpc, {'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}},
 1335: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, table_info, [tab1, where_to_read])),
 1336:     
 1337:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
 1338:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[tab1], 1000])),
 1339:     ?match(N2, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, table_info, [tab1, where_to_read])), 
 1340:     ?match([{tab1, 1, 1}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [tab1, 1])),
 1341:     
 1342:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Ns),
 1343:     ?match({[ok, ok], []}, rpc:multicall(Ns -- [N1], mnesia, start, [])),
 1344:     ?match({ok, [N2]}, ?rpc_connect(N3, [N2])),
 1345:     % Make a merge conflict
 1346:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, create_table, [tab1, []])),
 1347:     
 1348:     io:format("We expect a mnesia crash here~n", []),
 1349:     ?match({error,{_, _}}, mnesia:start()),
 1350: 
 1351:     ?verify_mnesia(Ns -- [N1], []),
 1352:     ok.
 1353: 
 1354: 
 1355: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1356: unknown_config(doc) ->
 1357:     ["Try some unknown configuration parameters and see that expected",
 1358:      "things happens."];
 1359: unknown_config(suite)-> [];
 1360: unknown_config(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1361:     ?init(1, Config),
 1362:     %% NOTE: case 1 & 2 below do not respond the same
 1363:     ?match({error, Res} when element(1, Res) == bad_type,
 1364: 	   mnesia:start([{undefined_config,[]}])),
 1365:     %% Below does not work, but the "correct" behaviour would be to have
 1366:     %% case 1 above to behave as the one below.
 1367: 
 1368:     %% in mnesia-1.3 {error,{bad_type,{[],undefined_config}}}
 1369:     ?match({error, Res} when element(1, Res) == bad_type,
 1370: 	   mnesia:start([{[],undefined_config}])),
 1371:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
 1372:     ok.
 1373: 
 1374: 
 1375: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1376: inconsistent_database(doc) ->
 1377:     ["Replace the event module with another module and use it as",
 1378:      "receiver of the various system and table events. Provoke",
 1379:      "coverage of all kinds of events."];
 1380: inconsistent_database(suite) -> [];
 1381: inconsistent_database(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1382:     Nodes = mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]}], 
 1383: 					      2, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE),
 1384:     KillAfter = length(Nodes) * timer:minutes(5),
 1385:     ?acquire_schema(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, KillAfter}]),
 1386: 
 1387:     Ok = [ok || _N <- Nodes],
 1388:     StartArgs = [{event_module, mnesia_inconsistent_database_test}],
 1389:     ?match({Ok, []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, start, [StartArgs])),
 1390:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1391:     
 1392:     ?match(ok, mnesia_meter:go(ram_copies, Nodes)),
 1393: 
 1394:     mnesia_test_lib:reload_appls([mnesia], Nodes),
 1395:     ok.
